column4: Anyone Know about RAIDs here? The difference between hardware and software RAID and the pros and cons of each?
what do you want to know?

RAID 1 Question - I have a Supermicro motherboard that has 4 SATA connections; Can I have 2 RAID 1 setups on that? i.e. Can I take 2 100g HDs and set them up in a RAID 1 for my Ubuntu Server OS and then later take 2 1Tb HDs and set them up in a RAID 1 for my mass storage drive and then mount them within the system
if the raid controller allows you to have more than 1 volume (most do), then yes.
however, you need to make sure that your raid card is supported.
would that be a hardware or software RAID
most on-motherboard raid controllers are pseudo-software raid.  pure hardware raid is expensive.
those SATA ports are on on-board if that matters... how do i go about seeing if it is supported
well, do you know the model of your motherboard?
